text: Janet Peoples is an American screenwriter. She co-wrote the script for the 1995 Academy Award-nominated film 12 Monkeys with her husband David Peoples who has written a number of films, mostly science fiction or fantasy. She and her husband also co-wrote the 1980 documentary The Day After Trinity, which was also nominated for an Academy Award. == External links == * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American screenwriters Category:American film producers Category:American women screenwriters
title: Janet Peoples
